taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have an existing fragment or module file opened.

step.cmd: On the Palette menu, in the Panels folder , click the widget.
In the Editor area, click the location where you want to place the widget.
step.stepresult: The Matrix is displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: From the Outline view, drag and drop an attribute to the x-axis.
From the Outline view, drag and drop an attribute to the y-axis.
From the Outline view, drag and drop an attribute to the cells section.
